file_content.text: I'm going to stay put for a while. Make sure this is really over.
Good luck in there.
I don't know why you folks are here, but I'm not asking questions. Get your heads down and listen to me.
Sergeant! You may have just saved the Republic. Get your head down and listen.
I don't know who you are, but you're shooting seps and that's good enough for me. Get your head down and listen to me.
One hour ago, we received a tip that the separatists were meeting with the leaders of violent splinter groups from across the Republic. The Nightmare of Duros ring a bell?
Command assumed they'd gather at Mannett Point, sent all squads there. Turns out the meetings are here. Now.
Those are incredibly high-value targets you're talking about. If they leave the planet....
We can't miss this chance.
Exactly. This is an opportunity we can't afford to have slip away.
By the time your people get here, they'll be long gone.
Guess they outsmarted you.
That's why I need you. It looks like you're headed that direction anyway, and I swear we'll make it worth your while.
Havoc Squad will handle this.
There's a reason Havoc Squad is a legend.
Wondering if I'm for hire?
I can guarantee a dip into our best assault team gear, and I can likely scrape together some credits.
Bad news for the assault.
That was my thought. Then I saw you.
According to intel, there's a computer inside the base with a list of all security assignments. Those leaders will be on that list.
You need to find that computer, grab the list of visiting leaders and hunt them down. Together, those men have the blood of millions on their hands.
Those traitors will not leave this planet.
For the Republic!
I'll get your scary rabble-rousers for you. May even bring you back some badly written protest literature.
Job's a job. I'm in.
Okay, even I care about that.
I've got it.
That computer is going to be guarded by some serious tech, watch out for patrol droids and good luck in there.
Get assassins. [Refuse quest]
Wrong person. [Refuse quest]
Then we'll have to hope the assault teams get here in time. Now get out of here before I'm spotted.
Keep moving. I don't want to be spotted.
